column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Service is AWFUL. Even if you have a reservation
column2: you usually have to wait 10-15 minutes for a table
column3: and last time we were there
column4: we were literally waving at our waiter to try to get his attention. He'd walk straight by and not make eye contact...about five times before taking our order
column6: etc. So much for that tip.
